subject: Olympic Games
lead_paragraph: As International Olympic Committee officials examined sites for the 2014 Winter Games in this Russian resort city, Natalia Shingaryova watched a wall of mud and garbage engulf her neighbor’s house.
snippet: As International Olympic Committee officials examined sites for the 2014 Winter Games in this Russian resort city, Natalia Shingaryova watched a wall of mud and garbage engulf her neighbor’s house.
